Numeric NBA franchise ID for this team in this specific game.
Game identifier for this single-game export (matches game_id without leading zeros).
NBA.com personId for the player.
Team abbreviation for the row.
Games played in sample (1 for active single-game rows).
Indicator that the player was inactive for the game.
Did not play flag for the game.

Did not play: coach’s decision flag if present in metadata.
Did not play flag specific to single-game exports.
Count of playoff games played if supplied upstream.
Blocks where the player’s team gains or keeps possession.
Count of and-one plays (FGM with drawn foul).
True shooting attempts: FGA + 0.44 * FTA.
True shooting percentage: PTS / (2 * TSAttempts) when TSAttempts > 0 else 0.
Alias of TSAttempts.
Alias of TSpct.
Possessions finished by player: FGA + 0.44 * FTA + TOV.
Usage rate: PossessionsUsed / POSS_OFF when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Field goal percentage: FGM / FGA when FGA > 0 else 0.
Free-throw percentage: FTM / FTA when FTA > 0 else 0.
Three-point percentage: ThreePM / ThreePA when ThreePA > 0 else 0.
Free-throw rate by attempts: FTA / FGA when FGA > 0 else 0.
Free-throw rate by makes: FTM / FGA when FGA > 0 else 0.
Offensive rebound percentage  estimate of share of available offensive rebounds the player grabs while on court.
Defensive rebound percentage: DREB / OnCourt_For_DREB_Total when denominator > 0 else 0.
Team offensive rebound opportunities on field goals while on court.
Team defensive rebound opportunities on field goals while on court.
Assist percentage: AST divided by teammate FGM (OnCourt_Team_FGM - FGM) when that total > 0 else 0.
Block percentage: BLK / OnCourt_Opp_2p_Att when denominator > 0 else 0.
Steal percentage: STL / POSS_DEF when POSS_DEF > 0 else 0.
Turnover percentage: TOV / PossessionsUsed when PossessionsUsed > 0 else 0.
Points per 100 offensive possessions: PTS / POSS_OFF * 100 when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Field goals made per 100 offensive possessions when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Field goal attempts per 100 offensive possessions when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Free throws made per 100 offensive possessions when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Free throws attempted per 100 offensive possessions when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Offensive rebounds per 100 offensive possessions: OREB / POSS_OFF * 100 when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Defensive rebounds per 100 defensive possessions: DREB / POSS_DEF * 100 when POSS_DEF > 0 else 0.
Assists per 100 offensive possessions: AST / POSS_OFF * 100 when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Steals per 100 defensive possessions: STL / POSS_DEF * 100 when POSS_DEF > 0 else 0.
Turnovers per 100 offensive possessions while on court: TOV / POSS_OFF * 100 when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Live-ball turnovers per 100 offensive possessions when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
Dead-ball turnovers per 100 offensive possessions when POSS_OFF > 0 else 0.
On-court scoring margin: OnCourt_Team_Points - OnCourt_Opp_Points.
Lowercase alias of FGM.
Lowercase alias of FGA.

Lowercase alias of ThreePM.

Lowercase alias of FTA.
Lowercase alias of PTS.
Pace while on court: (POSS_OFF + POSS_DEF) / Minutes * 48, 0 when Minutes == 0.
Blocks retained by opponent per 100 defensive possessions when POSS_DEF > 0 else 0.
Blocks recovered by team per 100 defensive possessions when POSS_DEF > 0 else 0.
Personal fouls per 100 total possessions on court: PF / POSS * 100 when POSS > 0 else 0.
Personal fouls drawn per 100 possessions on court when POSS > 0 else 0.

Charges drawn per 100 possessions on court when POSS > 0 else 0.
Technical fouls committed per 100 possessions on court when POSS > 0 else 0.
